titleStmt.title: A letter sent into France to the Lord Duke Buckingham His Grace of a great miracle wrought by a piece of handkerchefe, dipped in His Majesties bloud. The truth whereof, he himself saw, and is ready to depose it, and doth believe will be attested by 500. others, if occasion requires.
titleStmt.author: J. G.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
